BlurElysiumSlides.description: Here you can define Single Slides for the Elysium Slider

messages.createSlideError: The slide could not be saved.

actions.createSlideNoLanguageChange: New Slide can only be created in our chosen system default language

labelInput.title: Slide Label
labelInput.placeholder: Enter a Name for your Slide
labelInput.helpText: Set a name for the slide. This name will only be used to identify the slide

titleInput.title: Headline
titleInput.placeholder: Enter a Headline for your Slide
titleInput.helpText: Set a heading for the slide.

descriptionInput.title: Description
descriptionInput.placeholder: Enter a Description for your Slide
descriptionInput.helpText: Set a short description text for the slide. This will be displayed under the headline.

buttonLabelInput.title: Button Label
buttonLabelInput.placeholder: Enter a Button Label for your Slide
buttonLabelInput.helpText: Set the label of the button. If no label is provided no button will be display.

urlInput.title: Slide URL
urlInput.placeholder: Enter a URL for your Slide
urlInput.helpText: Set the linking of the slide. This can be both an absolute and a relative URL.

element.label: HTML Element
element.helpText: Lege ein HTML Element für deine Überschrift fest. Ist kein Element ausgewählt wird ein div Element verwendet

sllideCssClass.title: CSS Class
sllideCssClass.helpText: Set one or more CSS classes, separated by a space, for the slide.

buttonAppearance.label: Button Appearance
buttonAppearance.helpText: Sets the appearance of the button. The colors are based on the theme settings.

container.title: Content Container
container.description: Here you can influence the behavior of the content container. For more information, see our documentation.
container.helpText: If you activate the box mode, the content container is automatically limited to a maximum width of 50%. You can further specify the maximum width in the settings. With box mode enabled, you can also align the content container horizontally. Since the content container is displayed on full width when the box mode is inactive, the horizontal alignment has no effect.

horizontalAlign.title: Horizontal Alignment
horizontalAlign.helpText: Set the Horizontal Alignment of the Container Element. This Option just applies on Boxed Mode

overlay.description: When the URL overlay is activated, the button is hidden and the entire slide is used as a linking area.

uploadInput.title: Slide Cover
uploadInput.helpText: This image is used as background of the slide

coverPortrait.title: Slide Cover (Portrait-Mode)
coverPortrait.helpText: This image is used as background of the slide when the device (e.g. smartphone or tablet) is in portrait mode.

customFields.onCreateMessage: Please save the slide first. After that you can maintain the custom fields.
customFields.emptyFieldSet: You have not yet created any custom fields for the Elysium Slides. Go to the custom fields settings and create a set for the Elysium Slides.
